description.p: Deep within your blood lies the echo of a feral ancestorâ€”a towering beast of unmatched strength and fury. You have awakened this primal essence and forged a bond with it, allowing you to transform your body into a weregorilla-like form when the fight demands it. Your rage is your strength. Your fists are the storm.

sheet.description: Furybound Primal - Embrace your inner beast with feral transformations and overpowering strength.

description.p: At 3rd level, you can unleash the beast within. As a bonus action, you undergo a transformation for 1 minute. While transformed:

ul.li: You gain +1 AC (stacks with Iron Chin).
You can reroll 1s on unarmed damage rolls.
The first time you miss with an unarmed strike each turn, you may make one additional unarmed strike.
After taking the Attack action, you may spend 2 moxie points to make three unarmed strikes as a bonus action.

description.p: You must finish a short or long rest before using this feature again.

sheet.description: Transform for 1 minute. Gain +1 AC, reroll 1s on unarmed damage, get a free strike on first miss per turn, and spend 2 moxie to make three bonus unarmed strikes after taking the Attack action.

description.p: At 6th level, you gain the ability to briefly channel your full beastial strength. As a bonus action, you can spend 2 moxie points to gain the following benefits for 1 minute:

ul.li: Your melee weapon and unarmed attacks deal an extra 1d4 damage.
You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
You count as one size larger for carrying, pushing, pulling, and grappling.

sheet.description: Spend 2 moxie to gain 1d4 bonus melee damage, advantage on Strength checks and saves, and count as one size larger for grappling etc. (1 min).

description.p: At 11th level, while Furybound Transformation is active, your size increases by one category (to a maximum of Large). If there is insufficient room, grow to the maximum possible size. While enlarged:

ul.li: You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical sources.

description.p: When your transformation ends, you gain one level of exhaustion.

sheet.description: While transformed, you become one size larger, gain 5 ft reach, resistance to B/P/S damage (nonmagical). One level of exhaustion when it ends.

description.p: At 17th level, you can unleash a devastating finisher. Once per long rest, when a creature is below half HP and within 10 feet, you can use your action and spend 5 moxie points to attempt a brutal takedown.

ul.li: The target makes a Strength saving throw (DC = 8 + proficiency bonus + Strength mod).
On a failure, it takes 10d10 force damage and is knocked prone and stunned until the end of its next turn.
On a success, it takes half damage and is not stunned.

sheet.description: Spend 5 moxie to attempt a takedown on a below-half HP creature within 10 ft. DC = 8 + prof + STR. 10d10 force damage on fail (plus prone & stun); half on success.
